entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
